items.text: Scheduled polls now include 'Close Poll' and 'Save as Template' buttons in creator DM
Poll question max length reduced from 300 to 150 characters (Slack header block limit)
Scheduled poll times display in user's local timezone
Remove extra trailing divider in polls without action buttons
GitHub Actions workflow for auto-deployment to VPS
Release script that reads version from package.json and creates GitHub releases
App Home UI simplified for better readability
